name: Week#3 Music race
description:
Controls: Arrows Left and Right

Week#3 Music Race

Constraints:  Theme - music game

Core Dynamic: Avoid ships coming towards you that appears in the rhythm of the music played in the background.    

Conclusion: The music theme was cool. I thought there are so many possibilities - and I ended up like in this meme "I have no idea what I am doing". The main idea was something like "Groove Coaster" but apparently my 3d Unity skills  needs some refinement. It ended up as a simple avoid upcoming obstacles game. PS. I probably should have used some copyright free music instead of this piece. But Every good music game has a Japanese song in them. 

What went good: I have learned that sometimes to finish the project it is best to go with a simple solution. 

What went bad: My idea of a game was vivid as was my idea about my 3D Unity skills. I need to pick up a course or 2 to develop better skills to use the 3D environment.
